incidents.description: AI-generated fake news videos targeting Black celebrities like Sean 'Diddy' Combs spread widely.
Deepfake of CEO Neal Mohan tricked creators into clicking malicious links in a phishing scam.
Deepfake ads promoted fraudulent products on YouTube channels.
AI-generated video misrepresented election candidates.
Scammers used AI voice clone and YouTube footage to impersonate WPP CEO in a scam.
AI-generated images of Trump in Hurricane Helene floodwaters shared widely.
Deepfake campaign impersonating Rishi Sunak promoted fraudulent AI investment.
AI-generated deepfake of Trump mocking Zelenskyy for clothing went viral on Facebook.
Deepfake video misrepresented election results on Facebook.
AI-generated scam ads targeted users via Facebook Marketplace.
Scammers used AI deepfakes impersonating Brad Pitt to defraud a woman via Facebook.
AI-generated images falsely suggested Taylor Swift endorsed Donald Trump.
Kamala Harris depicted with communist flags at the DNC.
Nonconsensual deepfake pornography of Bobbi Althoff went viral on X, highlighting lax moderation.
Deepfake video falsely depicted a politician in a scandal.
AI-generated article misrepresented election results.
Deepfake audio targeted a public figure in a scam.
AI-generated explicit images of Taylor Swift circulated on X, garnering 45 million views.
Non-consensual deepfake pornography targeted female Twitch streamers, published on a subscription site.
Cotton Sandstorm’s AI-generated content spread election misinformation via Twitch streams.
AI-crafted propaganda video on Twitch promoted anti-Israel narratives.
AI-generated song falsely attributed to Justin Bieber, referencing Sean Combs, went viral.
TikTok’s AI amplified election disinformation.
Deepfake ads promoted fraudulent products, targeting influencers.
AI-generated influencer posts spread election misinformation.
Viral thread amplified AI-generated deepfake of a political figure.
AI-generated memes spread false narratives about celebrities.
DALL-E 2 risks of generating disinformation discussed in Reddit threads.
Cotton Sandstorm used AI-crafted messaging to spread Israel-Hamas propaganda.
Deepfake video targeted activists with false claims.
Deepfake robocall mimicking Joe Biden discouraged voting, reported by CNN.
Deepfake videos targeted candidates in Turkey’s 2023 presidential elections.
AI-generated images fueled conspiracy theories, covered by Reuters.
AI chatbots repeated Russian disinformation, citing fake news sites, reported by The New York Times.
Cotton Sandstorm’s anti-Israel deepfake during Olympics, reported by The Guardian.
